amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the EPA administrator to submit a report, within 60 days after the enactment of the Act, that details how the provisions made by this Act are projected to increase oil and gas production and lower energy prices for consumers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 112-111 to require a report that details how the amendments made by this Act are projected to increase oil and gas production and lower energy prices for consumers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hochul amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 238 (Roll no. 475).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hochul amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 238 (Roll no. 475).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Hochul.
